name: Leisure Suit Leo II: The Secret of Maniac Island
overview: Leisure Suit Leo II: The Secret of Maniac Island is a German language Commodore 64 graphics/text adventure game released in 1997 by Out of Order. A text adventure with graphics created by Stephan Lesch and Tobias Erbsland of Volker Rust as a parody of the adult themed Leisure Suit Larry series. A preview version was also released in GO64! 1998/01. An English version was later created but not published.
